data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Liberecký, Czechia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Liberecký, Czechia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 3,154 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.section_summary: On average, 48 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Liberecký, Czechia.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Liberecký to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Liberecký, Czechia that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Bosniak people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Liberecký, Czechia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Liberecký who will make disciples who make disciples.
God, we pray for the believers in Liberecký, Czechia to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
